title: Critical Issue: Unable to Log In
description: This bug indicates that users are unable to log in to the system. It poses a critical threat to the functionality of the application.

title: Component Loading Failure
description: This bug suggests that there's an issue with loading certain components or resources within the system, affecting user experience and functionality.

title: Critical: Server Unavailability
description: This bug indicates that the server hosting the application is not functioning properly or is completely offline. It requires immediate attention to restore service.

title: Recurring Login Issue
description: Similar to the first bug, this indicates a recurring issue where users cannot log in to the system, causing frustration and hindering user productivity.

title: Server Error: Resource Not Found (404)
description: This bug signifies that a requested resource was not found on the server, typically resulting in a '404 Not Found' error, impacting user experience and functionality.

title: Critical: Overflow Condition Detected
description: This bug indicates that there's an overflow condition occurring, possibly leading to unexpected behavior or system instability, posing a critical risk to system performance.

title: Unauthorized Access (401)
description: This bug lacks a specific title, possibly indicating an incomplete entry or oversight in the bug tracking system. It highlights a critical security vulnerability requiring immediate attention.
